member.name: M:Nager.Date.PublicHolidays.NewZealandProvider.InitMatariki
member.summary: Matariki (Maori New Year) is introduced as a national public holiday beginning in 2022. The first 30 years of dates have been agreed upon by the Matariki Advisory Committee. The dates have been chosen to account for adjustments between the Maori lunar calendar and the Gregorian calendar, while ensuring the public holiday falls on a Friday.
